name: Downtown
description: Downtown is one of the sub-districts of City Center, located in central Night City. After the Fourth Corporate War, an effort was made to rebuild this area of Night City along Western European architecture. Known as Little Europe during the Time of the Red, this district became a booming city section in development and a major center of population due to the loss of the neighboring City & Corporate Districts during the AHQ Disaster. However, necessity and budget concerns soon began to...
